item.title: Proposal caps brackets at 75 percent for NCAA Division III winter, spring championships
item.description: The NCAA Division III Championships Committee on Tuesday recommended that winter and spring 2021 national championship brackets and field sizes not exceed 75 percent of their standard capacity.

item.title: NCAA announces the 2020 NCAA wrestling award winners
item.description: The NCAA has released the winners and final standings for the 2020 NCAA wrestling awards in Divisions I, II and III.

item.description: The NCAA has released updated standings for the 2020 NCAA Wrestling Awards that will be awarded in March at the respective Division I, II and III Wrestling Championships.

item.description: Here are all the Division III wrestling qualifiers for the 2020 championship, announced by the NCAA on Monday.

item.title: 11 college sports mega-rivalries that may have slipped under your radar
item.description: Rivalries in college sports often bring out exciting, intense and (sometimes) heartbreaking moments in sports history. Here's a look at 11 you may not know, but definitely should.

item.title: Augsburg University wins the 2019 DIII Wrestling Championship
item.description: Augsburg University has won the 2019 DIII Wrestling Championship, which marks their 13th National Championship in program history. Look back at all the excitement from the championship matches.

item.title: 2019 DIII Wrestling Championship: Day One Recap
item.description: Look back on all the excitement from the mat at Day One of the 2019 DIII Wrestling Championship.

item.title: 2019 DIII wrestling championships: Augsburg claims national title
item.description: Augsburg claimed the national title, holding off defending national champions Wartburg and ending the three-year championship streak the Knights had held.

item.title: College wrestling: DII and DIII regionals help shape award standings headed into NCAA championships
item.description: Division II and III wrestlers competed in their NCAA regional qualifying tournaments over the weekend to set the standings headed into the NCAA championships. These are the wrestling leading the Most Dominant Wrester, fall and tech fall standings across all three divisions.

item.title: How this year’s college wrestling pinning wars have helped shape the Most Dominant wrestler rankings
item.description: The title Most Dominant Wrestler is one of the most cherished accomplishments in NCAA wrestling — but what does it take to accomplish that goal? Here is how someone can average enough team points to earn that claim to fame and how competitive is the race for such an accolade?

item.title: NCAA wrestling qualifiers announced for 2019 DIII championship
item.description: The 2019 DIII Wrestling Championships qualifiers and brackets have been announced.

item.title: College wrestling standings: NCAA debuts wrestling award standings for 2019 season
item.description: The first college wrestling award standings for the stat leaders in NCAA DI, DII, and DIII wrestling were released Jan. 9.
